item.title: Hello R Markdown
item.description: R Markdown This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com. You can embed an R code chunk like this: 1summary(cars) 2## speed dist 3## Min. : 4.0 Min. : 2.00 4## 1st Qu.:12.0 1st Qu.: 26.00 5## Median :15.0 Median : 36.00 6## Mean :15.4 Mean : 42.98 7## 3rd Qu.
